attributes.action: Demand that the Government start testing all Citizens for Covid-19, immediately.
attributes.background: We need to make sure we know who have definitely tested positive for Covid-19, then informed actions can be taken to protect our Citizens and help to stop the spread of the disease through our Communities. This can only be done by beginning immediately to test everyone.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament. You will receive an automated email confirming this decision.

We have published a petition calling for the Government to provide publicly accessible testing for coronavirus around the UK, which you might want to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
